FuncDef: If thesend-queriescommand is enabled, this parameter allows tuning for the expected packet loss on a SAP or SDP and is comparable to a retry count. If this SAP or SDP is expected to experience high packet loss, this parameter may be increased. IGMP snooping on this SAP or SDP is robust to packet losses.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the robust count for the SAP or SDP. Values-2 to 7.
